translations: 修剪成装饰形式的；修剪成形的

sentences.sentence: The Orangery will be decorated with copious topiaries, flowers, trelisses etc.
sentences.translation: “橘园”会用大量的灌木，鲜花以及花架等来装饰。

sentences.sentence: Chapters on vase arrangements, leaf tricks, topiaries, wedding designs and more make this volume an indispensable addition to every florist's workroom.
sentences.translation: 书中章节有玻璃瓶插、叶材应用、园艺修剪、婚礼设计等等更多内容，使之成为一本从业人员必不可少的图书。
